title: Custom E-liter 3K Scope
paragraphs: The Custom E-liter 3K Scope(NA), or Custom E-Litre 3K Scope(EU/OC), is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is the Custom version of the E-liter 3K Scope and the scoped version of the Custom E-liter 3K.

The Custom E-liter 3k Scope is nearly identical in appearance to the Custom E-liter 3K. However, the Custom E-liter 3K Scope has a dark-blue scope attached to the barrel, along with a black metal sight.
The Custom E-liter 3K Scope was released on 10 October 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Squid Beakons and the Kraken.
- An Inkling firing a Custom E-liter 3K Scope. (behind)
- Running with a Custom E-liter 3K Scope equipped.
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Custom E-liter 3K Scope.
- The Custom E-liter 3K Scope and its variants are created by Custom.
